keyPolicies.policyDescription: The candidate advocates for the support of small business enterprises.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fight the imposition of Sharia Law (Islamic religious law and observance) on the British population
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The candidate opposes the imposition of Sharia Law on the British population.
The candidate wants to express opposition to mass immigration.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Say YES to referendums on all major issues
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The candidate supports holding referendums for major issues to ensure public opinion is considered.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Say NO to wasting Â£45 million a day in Brussels
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The candidate opposes the UK's financial contribution to Brussels, implying a stance against certain EU financial demands or policies.

issues.immigration: The candidate wants to express opposition to mass immigration.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have full confidence that the inner resources of the British people can address the challenges of the 21st century without subservience to the interests of a continental superpower, especially one that shows its blatant contempt for the principles of democratic accountability.

contactInformation.address: UK Independence Party, Lexdrum House, Unit 1, King Charles Business Park, Newton Abbot, Devon TQ12 6UT

images.caption: Image of Magnus Nielsen with contact information for UKIP.
